mapper.select: select * from chick_cart where memberId=#{memberId} and goodsId=#{goodsId}
mapper.update: update chick_cart set cartStock=cartStock+1 where memberId=#{memberId} and goodsId=#{goodsId}
mapper.select: select c.memberId, c.goodsId, c.cartStock, g.id, g.goodsFileName1 ,g.goodsName, g.goodsStock, g.goodsPrice, g.goodsDiscount from chick_cart c, chick_goods g where c.goodsId = g.id and c.memberId=#{memberId} order by id desc
mapper.update: update chick_cart set cartStock=cartStock-1 where memberId=#{memberId} and goodsId=#{goodsId}
mapper.delete: delete from chick_cart where memberId=#{memberId} and goodsId=#{goodsId}
